data.name: Drop Out 0 Demo
data.detailed_description:
Drop Out 0 is an online first person shooter with a twist: there are no hitpoints! Beat your opponents by knocking them out of the map.

The demo version has the same features as the original, there are however some restrictions:
  • No Steam functionality (achievements and trading cards)
  • XP limited to 14, allowing 4 unlocks in total
  • acces only to 1 multiplayer map (ML01_Platforms)
  • No test loadouts; you cannot use locked weapons in practice mode
  • No access to Social Menu or Profile
  • No LAN mode
  • Client automatically disconnects to make room for paying players, if servers are almost full.

Try it out! And make sure to buy the full version if you like it!

data.short_description: Drop Out 0 is an online first person shooter with a twist: there are no hitpoints! Beat your opponents by knocking them out of the map with various crazy weapons. Demo version provides the game with reasonable restrictions, try it out for free!

  • Processor: 0.9 GHz or more
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Basic graphics card sufficiënt
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: not required
  • Additional Notes: Bare bone setting available, should run fine on toasters
